name: flatcrawl
description: Flatcrawl makes it easy to search for flats! It collects flats from different rental sites and exposes them in a consistent shape. Furthermore it lets you define custom searches through a Telegram bot that sends instant messages on new matches.

scripts.deploy:container: docker build . -t floschnell/flatcrawl:latest; docker push floschnell/flatcrawl
scripts.deploy:remote: ssh root@floschnell.de "docker pull floschnell/flatcrawl:latest; docker stop flatcrawl; docker rm flatcrawl; docker run -dit --restart unless-stopped -p 8443:8443 --name flatcrawl floschnell/flatcrawl:latest"

author: Florian Schnell
